pr_title: LUCENE-9287:Add DocValuesFieldExistsQuery as a never cache query in UsageTrackingQueryCachingPolicy

timeline.message: Add DocValuesFieldExistsQuery as a never cache query in UsageTrackingQueryCachingPolicy

timeline.bodyText: This is an implementation detail of this class, maybe say something like UsageTrackingQueryCachingPolicy no longer caches DocValuesFieldExistsQuery?
timeline.author: jpountz
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -127,6 +127,9 @@ Optimizations
 * LUCENE-8103: DoubleValuesSource and QueryValueSource now use a TwoPhaseIterator if one is provided by the Query.
   (Michele Palmia, David Smiley)
 
+* LUCENE-9287:Add DocValuesFieldExistsQuery as a never cache query in UsageTrackingQueryCachingPolicy.
